post.summary: Create a new quiz with explicitly keyed images
post.description:
Creates a new quiz by processing a multipart/form-data request. The request must include:
1.  A **`quizData` part**: This part contains the quiz's metadata as a JSON string, conforming to the `QuizDTO` schema.
    It is crucial that this part has a `Content-Type` header of `application/json`.
    - The `QuizDTO` should specify `coverImageUploadKey` (string, optional) for the quiz's cover image.
    - Each `QuestionDTO` within `quizData` can specify `questionImageUploadKey` (string, optional) for its associated image.
2.  **Image file parts**: For each `coverImageUploadKey` or `questionImageUploadKey` provided in the `quizData` JSON,
    a corresponding binary file part must be sent.
    - The **name of each image file part MUST exactly match** the corresponding `uploadKey` string from `quizData`.
    For instance, if `quizData` includes `"coverImageUploadKey": "promoImage123"`, then the multipart request must contain
    a file part named `promoImage123` with the image data.

requestBody.description: Multipart request containing quiz data and image files.

Quiz with Cover and Question Image.description:
Illustrates sending `quizData` (as application/json) and two image files.
The part names for images (`cover123`, `q_image_abc`) MUST match the keys specified in `quizData`.
(Note: Binary data is represented conceptually below).
Quiz with Cover and Question Image.value:
--boundary
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="quizData"
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "title": "My Keyed Image Quiz",
  "coverImageUploadKey": "cover123",
  "questions": [
    {
      "title": "Question 1 with Image",
      "questionImageUploadKey": "q_image_abc"
      /* other question props */
    }
  ]
  /* other quiz props */
}
--boundary
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="cover123"; filename="cover.jpg"
Content-Type: image/jpeg

(binary image data for cover.jpg)
--boundary
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="q_image_abc"; filename="question_pic.png"
Content-Type: image/png

(binary image data for question_pic.png)
--boundary--

get.summary: Get current authenticated user's game session history.
get.description: Retrieves a consolidated history of game sessions the authenticated user has hosted or participated in. Requires JWT authentication.

parameters.name: pageable
parameters.description: Pagination and sorting parameters (e.g., page=0&size=10&sort=time,desc). 'time' refers to session start time.

get.summary: Get a summary report for a specific game session.
get.description: Provides an overview of a completed game session, including general statistics, quiz information, and host details.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: UUID of the game session to retrieve the summary for.

404.description: Game session or related data not found.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of question reports for a specific game session.
get.description: Retrieves question details and aggregated player performance for each question in a session. Supports pagination and sorting by slide index.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of player reports for a specific game session.
get.description: Retrieves player performance data for a given session, including rank, score, accuracy, and timing. Supports pagination and sorting.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of a specific player's answers for a game session.
get.description: Retrieves all answers submitted by a particular player in a session, along with the context of each question. Supports pagination and sorting by question index.

404.description: Game session or player not found, or player does not belong to the session.

JsonNode.description: Snapshot of the question data as it was distributed or shown during the game. Structure depends on the question type.

gamePin.description: The game PIN of the session.

quizId.description: UUID of the quiz that was played.

hostUserId.description: User ID of the host who ran the session. If invalid, backend will use authenticated user.

sessionStartTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when the session started.

sessionEndTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when the session ended.

finalPlayerCount.description: The final count of players in the session.

finalSessionStatus.description: The final status of the session (e.g., 'LOBBY', 'RUNNING', 'ENDED', 'ABORTED').

allowLateJoin.description: Flag indicating if late joins were allowed.

powerUpsEnabled.description: Flag indicating if power-ups were enabled for the session.

terminationReason.description: Reason for session termination, if applicable.

terminationSlideIndex.description: Index of the slide where termination occurred, if applicable.

players.description: Array containing final results and details for each player.

gameSlides.description: Array containing information and all player answers for each slide presented during the session.

SessionFinalizationDto.description: Main DTO containing all data for finalizing a game session and storing its results.

slideIndex.description: 0-based index of this slide in the game sequence.

startedAt.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when this slide started being displayed.

endedAt.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when this slide finished being displayed.

originalQuestionId.description: Optional UUID of the original question from the quiz definition, if this slide was a question.

playerAnswers.description: Array of answers submitted by players for this specific slide. Empty for non-question slides or if no answers were given.

SessionGameSlideDto.description: Represents the state and data of a single slide shown during the game session.

clientId.description: Player's 'cid', used by backend to link to the correct player_id.

questionIndex.description: 0-based index of the game slide this answer pertains to (used for frontend reference, backend links via slideId).

text.description: Raw text input from the player, if applicable (e.g., for open-ended questions).

reactionTimeMs.description: Time taken by the player to submit the answer, in milliseconds.

answerTimestamp.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when the answer was submitted.

basePoints.description: Points awarded for the answer before any multipliers or power-ups.

finalPoints.description: Final points awarded for the answer after all calculations.

usedPowerUpId.description: Optional UUID of the power-up used by the player for this answer.

SessionPlayerAnswerDto.description: Represents a specific answer by a player for a specific game slide.

clientId.description: The WebSocket client ID used by the player during the session.

userId.description: Optional UUID of the player if they were logged into a user account.

joinedAt.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when the player joined.

joinSlideIndex.description: Slide index when the player joined (if joined late).

waitingSince.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when player started waiting, if applicable.

rank.description: Final rank of the player in the session.

totalScore.description: Final total score achieved by the player.

correctAnswers.description: Total number of correctly answered questions.

streakCount.description: Maximum answer streak achieved by the player.

answerCount.description: Total number of questions answered (correctly or incorrectly).

unansweredCount.description: Total number of questions not answered (timeout/skipped).

totalTime.description: Sum of reaction times (in milliseconds) for all answered questions.

lastActivityAt.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) of the player's last activity.

avatarId.description: Identifier for the player's chosen avatar (e.g., a UUID string or a predefined name).

SessionPlayerDto.description: Represents the final aggregated results and details for a single player in the session.

answer.description: Text content of the answer choice. Used if 'image' is not present for this choice.

correct.description: Indicates if this choice is a correct answer.

ChoiceDTO.description: Represents an answer choice for a question

url.description: Direct URL (file_path) to the image. This is provided in requests and responses.

contentType.description: Content type of the image. Optional, backend might infer or retrieve if image is internal.

ImageDetailDTO.description: Details of an image, often used within question choices. The URL is the primary field.

id.description: Unique identifier for the question (generated by backend for response)

title.description: The question text, or title for 'content' type slides. Can contain HTML.
title.example: Which technology is NOT part of the frontend stack?

description.description: Detailed description, primarily for 'content' type slides.
description.example: This section will test your knowledge...

time.description: Time limit for the question in milliseconds. Not applicable for 'content' type.

pointsMultiplier.description: Points multiplier for the question. Not applicable for 'content' or 'survey' types.

choices.description: List of choices for the question. Structure depends on the question type. Not applicable for 'content' type where it can be null/empty.

image.description: URL (file_path) of the main image associated with the question. Provided in responses after upload.

media.description: Array for additional media elements (e.g., URLs or structured objects). For now, simple strings.

items.description: Array for additional media elements (e.g., URLs or structured objects). For now, simple strings.

position.description: 0-based order/position of this question within the quiz. If omitted, it will be assigned based on array order.

questionImageUploadKey.description: Unique key generated by the client to associate with this question's image file part in a multipart request. Used during quiz creation if an image for this question is uploaded.

QuestionDTO.description: Represents a single question or content slide within a quiz

visibility.description: Visibility status (e.g., 1 for public, 0 for private)

description.example: This quiz contains one example of each question type for frontend mocking purposes.

quizType.description: General type of the quiz, from mock's 'quizType'. Consider if this maps to a Quiz 'status' or a dedicated field.

questionCount.description: The number of questions in this quiz. Populated by the backend.

isValid.description: Server-side validation flag (populated by backend for responses)

playAsGuest.description: Flag indicating if guests can play (game session property, not quiz typically)

status.description: Status of the quiz (e.g., DRAFT, PUBLISHED). If not provided in request, defaults to DRAFT.

type.description: Redundant type field from mock? Matches mock's 'type' field.

created.description: Creation timestamp (Unix millis, populated by backend for responses)

modified.description: Last modified timestamp (Unix millis, populated by backend for responses)

tags.description: List of tag names associated with the quiz. Provided during creation, included in responses.

items.description: List of tag names associated with the quiz. Provided during creation, included in responses.

totalQuizTimeLimitMs.description: Calculated total time limit (in milliseconds) for all questions in the quiz. Only present in specific responses like /my-quizzes.

uuid.description: Unique Quiz Identifier (generated by backend for responses)

creator.description: User ID of the creator (set by backend based on authenticated user)

creator_username.description: Username of the creator (populated by backend for responses)

cover.description: URL (file_path) of the cover image for the quiz. Provided in responses after upload.

coverImageUploadKey.description: Unique key generated by the client to associate with the cover image file part in a multipart request. Used during quiz creation if a cover image is uploaded.

QuizDTO.description: Represents a Quiz, used for both creation requests and responses

id.description: Video ID from the service (e.g., YouTube video ID)

startTime.description: Start time for the video playback in seconds

endTime.description: End time for the video playback in seconds

fullUrl.description: Full URL to the video (can be derived if ID and service are known)

username.description: Desired username for the new account

email.description: Email address for the new account

name.description: Name/Title of the quiz played in this session.

time.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the session started.

endTime.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the session ended.

playerCount.description: Number of players who participated in this session.

roleInSession.description: The role of the current authenticated user in this specific session.

sessionHostUserId.description: UUID of the user who hosted this specific session.

sessionHostUsername.description: Username of the user who hosted this specific session.

quizId.description: UUID of the quiz used in this session.

UserSessionHistoryItemDto.description: Summary of a game session in a user's history (either hosted or participated).

QuizInfo.description: Simplified information about the quiz played.

questionsCount.description: Total number of questions in the quiz.

averageAccuracy.description: Overall average accuracy of answers across all players and scored questions.

time.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the session started.

endTime.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the session ended.

username.description: Username of the host who conducted the session.

isScored.description: Indicates if the quiz questions are scored.

hasCorrectness.description: Indicates if questions have a defined correctness (not a survey).

scoredBlocksWithAnswersCount.description: Number of question slides for which answers were submitted.

averageTime.description: Overall average response time (milliseconds) for correct answers to scored questions.

averageIncorrectAnswerCount.description: Average number of incorrect answers per player.

controllersCount.description: Number of players who participated in the session.

SessionSummaryDto.description: Summary report for a completed game session.

answerText.description: The text of the answer choice. Could be null if choice is image-based and text not provided.

choiceIndex.description: The index of this choice in the original question's choice list.

status.description: The status if this choice was the correct one.

count.description: Number of players who selected this choice.

AnswerDistributionDto.description: Represents the distribution of answers for a single choice of a question.

slideIndex.description: 0-based index of this question/slide in the game sequence.

title.description: Title or text of the question.
title.example: Đâu KHÔNG phải là một loại Kiểm thử chức năng?

choices.description: Original choices presented to the player for this question.

imageUrl.description: Media URL if any was associated with the question.

totalAnswers.description: Total number of answers submitted for this question.

totalAnsweredControllers.description: Number of distinct players who answered this question.

averageAccuracy.description: Average accuracy for this question (correct answers / total valid answers). Null if not a gradable question.

averageTime.description: Average time (ms) taken by players to answer this question. Null if not a gradable question or no valid answers.

answersDistribution.description: Distribution of answers across the choices for this question.

QuestionReportItemDto.description: Report details and statistics for a single question (block) within a game session.

unansweredCount.description: Number of questions the player did not answer (timeout/skipped).

averageAccuracy.description: Player's average accuracy (correct answers / total answered).

averagePoints.description: Player's average points per answered question.

totalTime.description: Player's total reaction time across all answered questions (milliseconds).

averageTime.description: Player's average reaction time per answered question (milliseconds).

playerId.description: Internal Player UUID (primarily for backend use, can be exposed if useful).

clientId.description: Client ID used by the player during the session.

answersCount.description: Total number of questions the player answered.

correctAnswersCount.description: Number of questions the player answered correctly.

PlayerReportItemDto.description: Report details for a single player in a game session.

choice.description: Index(es) of the choice selected by the player. Could be a single index, or array for jumble/multi-select. Stored as a string.

text.description: Text input by the player for open-ended questions.

reactionTime.description: Time taken by the player to submit this answer (milliseconds).

points.description: Points awarded for this specific answer.

blockIndex.description: 0-based index of the question/slide this answer pertains to.

AnswerDetails.description: Specific details of the player's answer.

PlayerAnswerReportItemDto.description: Details of a single answer provided by a player, including question context.

displayText.description: The text displayed to the player for their chosen answer. For multiple choice, this is the text of the chosen option.
displayText.example: Kiểm thử kiểm soát truy cập

blockTitle.example: Đâu KHÔNG phải là một loại Kiểm thử chức năng?

blockIndex.description: 0-based index of this question/slide in the game sequence.

blockChoices.description: Original choices presented for this question.

QuestionContextData.description: Contextual data of the question for which the answer was provided.
